description: Try our easy to follow Tempura Veg Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tempura Veg Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauces, mirin, honey and mustard in a jug. Set aside.

Place cabbage into a bowl. Using a peeler, shave carrots into thin ribbons. Combine cabbage, carrot, kale and spring onion. Add combined flour and cornflour. Stir until combined. Whisk eggs and 1 tablespoon water in a jug. Add to veg and toss until well combined.

Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add 1/2 cup quantities of vegetable mixture to pan and flatten slightly. Cook for 4 minutes or until golden. Turn and cook for 3 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Repeat with remaining fritters, using more oil as required.
Cook noodles following packet directions. Serve with fritters and dressing.
